Package CAMs_App.controllers

Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
CAMs_App.controllers.UserController
CAMs_App.controllers.StudentController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CampComController
public class StudentController extends UserController
The StudentController class is responsible for handling the student-specific user interface and user interactions. It extends the UserController class and provides functionality for students to view available and registered camps, register for camps, withdraw from camps, as well as create, edit and delete enquiries to camps they registered for.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentController

      public StudentController()

  • Method Details

    • viewAvailableCamp

      public boolean viewAvailableCamp()
      Calls StudentCampService to display all camps available for register to this student.
      Returns:
      false if no camps are available, true if otherwise.

    • joinAsAttendee

      public void joinAsAttendee()
      Registers for the current camp as a regular attendee by calling registerAsAttendee method from the corresponding StudentCampService object. The register will fail if:
      1. The camp is full
      2. The student has already registered for the camp
      3. The student has withdrawn from this camp before

    • joinAsCommittee

      public boolean joinAsCommittee()
      Register for the current camp as a committee member by calling registerAsCommittee method from the corresponding StudentCampService object. Prompt user to key in the position as the committee member The register will fail if:
      1. The camp's committee slots are full
      2. The student has already registered for the camp
      Returns:
      true if register successful, false if otherwise.

    • withdrawCamp

      public void withdrawCamp()
      Withdraws the student from the current camp by calling withdrawCamp method from the corresponding StudentCampService object.

    • viewRegisteredCamp

      public boolean viewRegisteredCamp()
      Calls viewRegisteredCamp method from StudentCampService to display all registered camp of this student.
      Returns:
      false if no camps are registered, true if otherwise.

    • viewEnquiry

      public void viewEnquiry()
      Calls viewEnquiries method from EnquiriesService to display all enquiries created by this student.

    • createEnquiry

      public void createEnquiry()
      Calls createEnquiries method from EnquiriesService to create enquiry. Prompts the student to enter a enquiry for the current camp.

    • editEnquiries

      public void editEnquiries()
      Prompts the student to select a submitted enquiry for edit, the edit will fail if enquiry is already processed.

    • deleteEnquiries

      public void deleteEnquiries()
      Prompts the student to select a submitted enquiry to delete, the delete will fail if enquiry is already processed.

    • switchMode

      public void switchMode(int currentMode)
      Switches the current user mode to camp committee mode
      Parameters:
      currentMode - The current user mode the system is in.
